entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
